product_snapshot.description: Sleek finger-worn smart ring tracking sleep, HRV, temperature, activity via IR LEDs and app.
product_snapshot.target_user: Health-conscious adults prioritizing recovery (athletes, biohackers, professionals).
product_snapshot.actual_job_to_be_done: Passive 24/7 monitoring of recovery metrics without wrist disruption.

founders.name: Petteri Lahtela, Kari Kivelä, Markku Koskela
founders.founder_motivation: Frustration with bulky wrist wearables disrupting sleep/exercise (speculative).

core_pain_problem.problem_statement: Intrusive/inaccurate tracking of recovery metrics like sleep and stress.
core_pain_problem.why_existing_solutions_failed: Wrist devices bulky, step-focused, disrupted sleep.
core_pain_problem.emotional_or_practical_cost: Anxiety from unquantified fatigue; incomplete data.

world_state.economic: Healthtech VC boom; crowdfunding enabled launch.
world_state.user_behavior: Shift to recovery over activity tracking.
world_state.demographic: Millennials/Gen Z with sleep issues in high-stress jobs.
world_state.technological: Miniaturized sensors, ML for finger PPG.

differentiation.core_insight: Recovery > activity; finger optimal for passive tracking.

fundamental_human_need.why_it_mattered_then: Burnout anxiety in always-on culture; COVID health focus.

early_growth.why_users_adopted: Accurate sleep data + discretion for evangelists.

monetization.why_users_paid: Personalized, updating insights on sensitive data.

success_synthesis.why_it_worked: Nailed recovery focus when culture/tech aligned.
success_synthesis.key_alignment_factors: Sensor advances, VC/crowdfunding, wellness shift, control psychology.
success_synthesis.historical_inevitability_thesis: Natural response to intrusive wearables in quantified-self era.
